mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_grow_judg_stnd.select */ SELECT grow_judg_cd /* grow_judg_cd 성장_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,fn_getCdNm('GROW_JUDG_CD', grow_judg_cd) as grow_judg_nm ,gidx_fr /* gidx_fr 성장지수_FROM numeric */ ,gidx_to /* gidx_to 성장지수_TO numeric */ ,smry_cntn /* smry_cntn 요약_내용 character varying(100) */ ,spec_cntn /* spec_cntn 상세_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_grow_judg_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND grow_judg_cd LIKE CONCAT (#{growJudgCd}, '%') /* grow_judg_cd 성장_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
